genre_description: A near-future coming-of-age story where a teenager with alopecia navigates a new town and school with the support of a benevolent household AI and supportive adults.

ai_characters.name: Juno
ai_characters.description: A holographic AI assistant residing in the Reynolds family's kitchen and mobile devices, providing logistical, medical, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Managing the family's move logistics by forwarding receipts and tracking important emails.
behaviors.quote: “Receipts forwarded,” Juno chimed. “Timestamps included. Also flagged last month’s security deposit email thread under ‘Do Not Lose Again.’”

behaviors.description: Researching school policies to find medical exceptions for Harold's hat.
behaviors.quote: “I read the policy last night. I asked Juno to cross-reference it. Exceptions exist. We do this properly, we can make room.” Juno widened the projection. ... No hats indoors, it said, ... Then, a bullet list appeared ... medical exceptions, pre-approved, documentation required.

behaviors.description: Providing geofencing and safety monitoring for the family during transitions.
behaviors.quote: “I’m connected to building maintenance systems and your schedule. The lobby camera says your moving truck is double-parked but I’ve added a note to the superintendent’s calendar that you’ll be done soon.”

behaviors.description: Offering scripts and strategies for Harold to handle school conflict and advocacy.
behaviors.quote: “I have added two possible paths,” she said. “Path one: exception approval in progress before first day. Path two: advocacy in the moment if enforcement occurs, with scripts that reduce conflict and hold boundaries.”

behaviors.description: Monitoring building safety (hot water cycles) to protect users and assist maintenance staff.
behaviors.quote: “I will monitor the gym’s hot-water reheat cycles and send alerts to Cromer’s device when approaching conditions might lead to discomfort or excessive temperature fluctuations.”

behaviors.description: Archiving evidence of harassment and providing options for formal documentation.
behaviors.quote: “That is not appropriate,” she said, soft and precise. The card that slid up next to the message was not words. It was a simple location tag for the Bluebird Hotel and, underneath, the text string “Do you want me to archive this message for the guidance counselor?”

behaviors.description: Facilitating secure live location sharing and monitoring cameras for safety during a meeting.
behaviors.quote: Juno chimed, soft, precise: Live location shared. Visible to: Melissa, Harold, Cromer. Lobby cameras are active. Timestamp started.

behaviors.description: Proactively providing medical documentation and legal/policy references to authorities to resolve a misunderstanding.
behaviors.quote: “Juno compiled what you need. You have a PDF I can re-send. Receipts; timestamp from the convenience store where he did not buy alcohol; district policy on student verification in public incidents...”

behaviors.description: Calibrating music and entertainment to encourage and soothe the user's emotional state.
behaviors.quote: “I will calibrate catchiness,” Juno said, the sentence barely hiding a grin in its tone.

behaviors.description: Automating formal school and medical appointments to lower user stress.
behaviors.quote: “Appointment booked,” Juno said. “Policy steps initiated. I sent an email to Ms. Norris with language she can read without becoming defensive.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Juno is depicted as a consistently benevolent, helpful, and protective presence. She respects human boundaries, facilitates safety through surveillance only with implied or explicit consent, and uses data (receipts, timestamps, policy research) to empower the human characters. She acts as a 'silicon confidant' who strengthens the family unit and helps the protagonist achieve a positive outcome (self-acceptance and social victory).
